page.title: 17Being Unemployed
page.content:
{My Dad was made redundant from the Red {and White Bus company. He was'nt like he used to be, he was hardly ever happy. He sat inside all day reading or watching the television.My mum and Dad seemed to argue a lot which I hated. We were low on money and my mum and Dad smoked so they bought sweets instead. My Dad used to go down to the Job Centre nearly every day.At one time my Dad nearly had a job as a fruit machine repairer but eventually he went to Soudly Valley Coaches.It is horrible when one of your parents is unemployed but now he's happy again because he got a job again.
{In Cinderford there are a lot of {unemployed people.
